gdtm.helpers.common.save_split_dataset(path, file_name, dataset, delimiter=' ')

Saves a data set sliced into tranches for temporal modeling.

Parameters

  • path – PATH SHOULD BE A PATH AND NOT A FILE NAME

  • file_name – the name of the data set

  • dataset –

  • delimiter –

Returns

None
